name: Pool (Playdate)
description:
A two player pool game with an accurate physics engine, tight controls, and a groovy soundtrack!

Music by: Valkin

V1.1:

  • Fixed a bug where the cue ball would sometimes not place after it was scratched.
  • It is now possible to also use left on the D-pad as opposed to A when shooting.
  • Updated the help text to include D-pad left
  • Fixed a bug where the cue ball could be hit after it was scratched.
  • Removed buildNumber from pdxinfo, sorry if this causes issues!
